catalog_info.title: Topics on Computation in Networks and Crowds
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Mathematics 21b, Applied Mathematics 21b, or equivalent; Computer Science 124, and 181 or 182, or equivalents; or permission of instructor.
catalog_info.description: Topics on the design and analysis of algorithms, processes, and systems related to crowds and social networks. Readings in AI, theoretical CS, machine learning, social science theory, economic theory, and operations research.
